DB2 disappointment

November 6th, 2002 · No Comments

I promised DB2 numbers and spent all morning getting it running with our system only to find that it has some really stupid limitations: index and constraint names are limited to 18 characters. This means that our system, which is packed with index names like IDX_QUESTION_QUESTIONID, will not work without significant reworking of our [...]

Excuse me while I gripe…

November 2nd, 2002 · No Comments

How does Windows Media Player suck? Let me count the ways:

The interface is completely nonstandard and difficult to use.
It’s crippled by draconian copy protection default settings.
Makes performing simple tasks far too difficult.
